home.title: Home - Grand Transport Logistics
home.description: Grand Transport Logistics is a dynamic freight and logistics company distinguished by its innovative approach to supply chain management.

aboutUs.title: About Us - Grand Transport Logistics
aboutUs.description: Grand Transport Logistics is a team of specialists offering modern logistics solutions across Europe.

gallery.title: Gallery - Grand Transport Logistics
gallery.description: Browse the photo gallery showcasing Grand Transport Logistics' operations â€“ a leader in modern logistics solutions. We provide transport and logistics services tailored to the needs of our clients across Europe.

career.title: Career - Grand Transport Logistics
career.description: Join the Grand Transport Logistics team and grow your career in the transport and logistics industry. We offer a dynamic work environment, opportunities to enhance your freight forwarding skills, attractive compensation, and collaboration on international projects. Check our current job openings and application documents.

documents.title: Documents - Grand Transport Logistics
documents.description: Find all the necessary documents related to Grand Transport Logistics' operations. Download forms related to transport, GDPR compliance, banking procedures, and other essential formalities. We ensure full transparency and easy access to required documentation.

contact.title: Contact - Grand Transport Logistics
contact.description: Get in touch with Grand Transport Logistics for detailed information about our services and offerings. Our team is ready to assist with inquiries about transport, logistics, and partnerships. Find our contact details and a convenient form to reach us quickly.

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.subtitle: Grand Transport Logistics is a group of specialists offering modern logistics solutions throughout Europe. During our work we take care to keep positive relations with our customers, as well as inside our company. It impacts directly into results at work and significant stable development.

localization.title: Our modern office
localization.subtitle: We are in the city center of Bydgoszcz. The office of our company is equipped with modern and ergonomic equipment, ensuring comfort and efficiency of work.

more.title: More about us
more.subtitle: Employee integration is a key element for us to build good relationships. Our team not only works together but also spends free time with each other. Thanks to our common interests, our time passes quickly and enjoyable.

career.text: Working at Grand Transport Logistics is an ideal opportunity for you to expand your transport offers or develop your freight forwarding skills. Cooperation in projects, an attractive remuneration system or constant expansion of your skills are just a few features that stand out our business.

form.title: Your contact details
form.note: If you want to join us, send your CV along with a cover letter to the address

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Contact the specialists of Grand Transport Logistics to discuss the details of cooperation. We will answer all your questions and clear your doubts about logistics transportation.
contact.teamTitle1: Need to get in contact with a person from our team?
